description:
It`s too hot at home, so Maruko asks her mom if they can get an A/C, and imgines her life with ten billion yen. Her dad buys her rhinoceros beetles, which leads to a fight with her sister.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Atsui Natsu o Ie de Sugoshita Ichinichi" no Maki
At Home on a Hot Summer Day
「暑い夏を家ですごした一日」の巻
